page.title: 02FARMS AROUND SHERSTON
page.content: Within the parish lie 12 farms, varying from 20 h to 300 h. 9 farms are owner occupied & 3 farms have been in the same family for 2 or more generations. One of the tenanted farms has a private landlord the other two are owned by Wiltshire C.C. All the farms employ mostly{family {labour. }8 sons are engaged in the family business with their fathers. 3 farmers are sole labour on their enterprises and call in contract labour when necessary. 9 workers live in tied cottages belonging to 4 farms. The{largest farm}is Pinkney Park, employing 4 full time workers including a farm manager. 7 farms have{traditional Cotswold {stone farmhouses}up to 150 years old, but Lower Farm dates back to the 16th century.
